name: Labophobia
description:
Labophobia is a 2D horror game that will immerse you in a terrifying atmosphere. Play as a scientist trying to escape from a laboratory while avoiding a monster.

The game consists of 50 rooms with different mechanics that must be solved to move on to the next.

Along the way, you'll face three bosses, each with their own skills and weaknesses. You'll need to use all your expertise to defeat them and continue your escape.
